headline: ConocoPhillips Stock: Is COP Underperforming the Energy Sector?
summary: Despite ConocoPhillips’s weak performance relative to the energy sector over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a bullish outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Kodiak Gas Services Announces Changes to Its Board of Directors
summary: THE WOODLANDS, Texas, September 02, 2025--Kodiak Gas Services, Inc. (NYSE: KGS) ("Kodiak" or the "Company") today announced the appointment of William ("Bill") L. Bullock, Jr., former Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of ConocoPhillips, to its Board of Directors, effective immediately.
